data.text: This is a message from Yahweh:
But I will cause you to experience a great disaster,
I will cause your enemies to come to your city;
Then you will talk as though you were buried deep in the ground [DOU];
But, suddenly your enemies will be blown away like dust;
The Commander of the armies of angels will come to help you
Then the armies of all the nations that will be attacking Jerusalem will quickly disappear like a dream in the night [DOU].
People who are asleep dream about eating food,
You people of Jerusalem, be amazed and surprised about this [IRO]!
Because Yahweh has prevented the prophets [DOU] from understanding and telling you his messages,

Yahweh gave me this vision; but for you, it is only words on a scroll that is sealed shut. If you give it to those who can read and request that they read it, they will say, “We cannot read it because the scroll is sealed.”
When you give it to others who cannot read, they will say, “We cannot read it because we do not know how to read.”
So the Lord says, “These people say that they belong to me.
Therefore, again I will do something to amaze these people;
Terrible things will happen to those who try to conceal from me, Yahweh,
They are extremely foolish!
Soon the forests in Lebanon will become fertile fields,
At that time, deaf people will be able to hear;
Yahweh will enable humble people to be very joyful again.
There will be no more people who ridicule others
Those who testify falsely in order to persuade judges to punish innocent people will vanish/disappear.
That is why Yahweh, who rescued Abraham, says about the people of Israel,
When they see that I have blessed them by giving them many children and doing many other things for them,
When that happens, those who have not been able to think well will think clearly,
